segments.text: I see the open window above the sink, letting in a calm and tidy view of the garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit happy seeing the peaceful outdoor scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman enjoys looking out that window while she works.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden seems to be well-maintained and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman gets to enjoy the garden after she finishes her chores.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the open window adds a nice touch to the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children ever play in the garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad thinking about them being cooped up inside, trying to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get to go outside and enjoy the garden soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the scene would be quite different if the window was closed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what the garden looks like from the children's perspective.
segments.speaker: PAR
